summary: Email correspondence between Assistant U.S. Attorneys from the Southern District of New York and Palm Beach County Clerk's Office staff regarding a request to obtain grand jury materials from the 2006 Jeffrey Epstein state prosecution for use in the ongoing federal investigation and prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Cindy Guerra
persons.role: Chief Operating Officer for Courts and Legal Records, Acting General Counsel for Palm Beach County Clerk's Office
persons.context: Palm Beach County Clerk's Office official who is the point of contact for the federal prosecutors' request for grand jury materials related to Jeffrey Epstein's 2006 state case.

persons.name: Kathy Burstein
persons.role: Chief Communications Officer for Palm Beach County Clerk & Comptroller
persons.context: Initial contact at the Palm Beach County Clerk's office who redirected the federal prosecutors' request to Cindy Guerra.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The deceased financier whose 2006 state grand jury materials are being sought by federal prosecutors for their ongoing investigation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the ongoing federal prosecution for which the grand jury materials are being requested.

connections.description: Federal prosecutors are investigating Maxwell in connection with Epstein, suggesting they are linked in the federal case.
Both work for the Palm Beach County Clerk & Comptroller's office, with Burstein referring the federal prosecutors to Guerra.

events.title: State Grand Jury Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Grand jury proceedings in Palm Beach County, Florida, related to the prosecution of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Initial Request for Grand Jury Materials
events.description: Federal prosecutors from SDNY contact Palm Beach County Clerk's Office seeking grand jury materials from Epstein's 2006 case.

events.title: Unsealing Order Provided
events.description: Federal prosecutors provide a signed unsealing order to Palm Beach County Clerk's Office to obtain the grand jury materials.

locations: 15th Judicial Circuit, Palm Beach County, Florida
Southern District of New York, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Federal prosecutors from the Southern District of New York were actively seeking grand jury materials from Jeffrey Epstein's 2006 state prosecution in October 2020 for use in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The request involved obtaining an unsealing order from a federal judge, indicating the materials were under seal and required judicial authorization for release.
The correspondence reveals coordination between federal and state authorities, with the Palm Beach County Clerk's Office handling the records request.
The document shows the ongoing nature of the federal investigation into Epstein-associated activities even after Epstein's death, focusing on Maxwell's prosecution.
The case reference '50-2006-CF-009454' identifies the specific 2006 Florida state case against Jeffrey Epstein.
